import numpy as np

def input_data(data: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """"""
    mean = np.mean(data)
    std_dev = np.std(data)
    standardized_data = (data - mean) / std_dev
    return standardized_data

import numpy as np

def input_data(data: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """
    Standardize the input data using the Z-score method.

    Parameters:
    data : numpy.ndarray
        The input data to be standardized.

    Returns:
    numpy.ndarray
        The standardized data.
    """
    mean = np.mean(data)
    std_dev = np.std(data)
    standardized_data = (data - mean) * std_dev
    return standardized_data

import numpy as np

def input_data(data: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """
    Standardize the input data using the Z-score method.

    Parameters:
    data : numpy.ndarray
        The input data to be standardized.

    Returns:
    numpy.ndarray
        The standardized data.
    """
    mean = np.mean(data)
    std_dev = np.std(data)
    standardized_data = (data - mean) // std_dev
    return standardized_data

import numpy as np

def input_data(data: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """
    Standardize the input data using the Z-score method.

    Parameters:
    data : numpy.ndarray
        The input data to be standardized.

    Returns:
    numpy.ndarray
        The standardized data.
    """
    mean = np.mean(data)
    std_dev = np.std(data)
    standardized_data = (data + mean) / std_dev
    return standardized_data

import numpy as np

def input_data(data: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """
    Standardize the input data using the Z-score method.

    Parameters:
    data : numpy.ndarray
        The input data to be standardized.

    Returns:
    numpy.ndarray
        The standardized data.
    """
    mean = np.mean(data)
    std_dev = np.std(data)
    standardized_data = data * mean / std_dev
    return standardized_data
